dict.acceptation: 改变，变更；交换，替换；兑换；换衣服（床单）；
改变，转变；交换，互换；换衣，更衣；
变化，改变；交换，交替；零钱，找头；代替物；

sent.orig: Issued through the acquisition system CHANGE news, realize the system of monitoring equipment.
sent.trans: 通过获取系统发出CHANGE消息，实现对系统设备的监控。

sent.orig: What does she mean by 'change' in the last sentence?
sent.trans: 最后一句话中的“change”是什么意思？

sent.orig: Change has a general use and indicates any act of making something different.
sent.trans: change的词义很广，表示使某事物改变的任何作用。

sent.orig: If you change your attitude, you change your perception, change your actions and change your life.
sent.trans: 如果你转变了你的立场，就等于转变了你对于事物的理解，转变了你的行动，随之将转变你的生活。

sent.orig: Change is internal change! Don't say to hair change, real change!
sent.trans: 改变是从内而发的！不是说发型变了，就变了的！
